Posts.Content: Hi there firstly let me say how sorry i am to hear your news i feel for you  I was diagnosed with the same five weeks ago and was operated the next week in Glasgow  i am now on hormone tablets and awaiting radiotherapy  i like you if they had left me would be climbing the walls but i would say trust your docs and they will do the best they can  . i dont think they would leave you that long to allow this to go any further . Re the radiotherapy the waiting list in glasgow is roughly 6 weeks after you see the radiotherapists so thats standard  good luck and please keep us updated  regards  Margt x
Posts.Title: Does anyone have advice?

Posts.Content: hi there so sorry to hear your news  I am four weeks into diagnosis and been through op and on treatment now all i can say is keep positive as it was explained to me cancer is like a cat it can be a kitten. cat , tiger ect ect . so until you see surgeon stay positive and a word of advise always take someone with you to take in what you are being told and good luck  please keep us updated on how things go  Margt x
